column3: The wounded Resistance fighter has a lot on his mind.
Deliver the bloody bandana to the Resistance fighter's mother in Ala Gannha.
There is something I would ask of you, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>.
I joined the Resistance against my mother's wishes. She awaits me back in my hometown.
I'm lucky to still be here after that last battle and I don't want to take her love for granted anymore.
Please, deliver this bandana to Mother in Ala Gannha on my behalf.
And tell her that I said “Thank you.” I want her to know I understand why she objected to me joining the fight against the Empire.
Please, deliver this bandana to Mother in Ala Gannha on my behalf. And tell her of my gratitude.
Wh-Why, this is my boy's! Has something happened to him!?
Thank heavens. He is still safe. I tried to dissuade him from joining the Resistance, but he would not listen. We had a big fight and he wound up sneaking out in the dead of night.
It is a weight off my mind to learn that he does not resent me. However, the fact he has returned this bandana must mean he intends to continue fighting.
If his resolve is truly that strong then there is little chance of me convincing him to come home. I will continue to pray for his safe return.
